title: Aerial View of a Wastewater Treatment Plant
description: An aerial view of a wastewater treatment facility featuring several circular tanks filled with dark water, surrounded by green grass and trees. The facility includes multiple rectangular structures and pathways, indicating a well-organized layout for water treatment processes.

title: Historical Portrait
description: A black and white portrait of an older man with glasses and a beard, wearing a dark suit and a white collar. He has a serious expression and is looking directly at the camera.

title: Turtle with Plastic
description: A close-up image of a sea turtle's head, partially submerged in water, with a piece of plastic wrap caught around its mouth. The turtle's shell displays intricate patterns and colors, while the background is blurred, suggesting an underwater environment.
